input.sentences: we were doing some set up for the concert following us | getting paid good money to do it too .
here i am | with the squad .
getting the cameras set up was one of the easier parts | adjusting for glare and wind was exceptionally difficult | though .
here i am | taking a bit of a lie down .
and here 's me again | taking a sit up ! we were done not long after this was taken .
output.sentences: People were working on a movie set by the beach.
They had been working on the movie together for awhile and had become a squad of good friends.
The sun started to set and it made a strange glare that wasn't good for filming.
While waiting for the glare problem to be fixed he decided to lie down for a bit.
With the problem fixed crew members sat at an angle and began to film.
